issue_description: Autonomous executor running in dry-run mode - patches never applied to disk
context: User discovered that phases report SUCCESS but no actual code is written. Line 304 in autonomous_executor.py has TODO comment: 'Patch applied successfully (TODO: actual patching)'. Error recovery system is working but can't fix the fact that no actual work is being done.
error_logs: No errors in logs - phases complete successfully but files unchanged on disk
